title: We need better communication and here is my idea on how to improve
body:
Hello Riot team, I want to get something that most MO-BA's should have i have seen many a time on forums about LoL Mods for skins and such but that's all well and good, however there is something that "NEEDS" to be implemented in to LoL around the world, i am talking about a updated ping system, as you should know alot of people can't type in battle and sometimes don't have many friends who/want to use Skype, mumble, Team speak, etc.

I have linked you to a ping system that i think was posted in NA servers and i am not sure if they are implemented, we need this, so, F-ING, badly, this could bring a whole new way of communication in the battle field, so much so that is may create a bigger player-base if such a game with good coms is around.

Please i beg you to see to this immediately and have this on OCE-PBE before the end of the year would be a kiss on the bum from the gods,

think about how many team-fights have had poor communication and leads to Tilting another player because someone is bullying another player because they didn't ping for a timer to attack and missed a epic fight that could have won them a game from promos or even a steamer who gets more views because he played like a god,

Think about it and hit me back, i have not created this and i hope the one who did will get the appreciation they deserve for being a Legend.

trolls do that anyway i am talking about when you play with friends and people who actually want to get better, we already see alot of toxic players on LoL (mostly normal's for me) i'd just really like to be able to ping more effectively rather then try and type and get ganked why calling MIA etc, which i am sure has happened to you a fair few times.
this has been suggest tons and tons of time. Its too many and you could easily misclick on the wrong one, baiting your ally instead of warning them etc.
